 package com.truntamjava.vonglap;

public class VongLapDoWhile {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int i = 0;
do {
	System.out.println(i);
	i++;
}while(i<5);
System.out.println("---");
int index = 0;
int[] a = {1,2,3,4,5,6};
do {
	System.out.println(a[index]);
	index++;
}while(index < a.length);
}
	}
